name: Ninja Dude vs Zombies 2 — endless slay 'em all
storyline:
A brave ninja is still trapped on a tower surrounded by hordes of bloody zombies. He didn't make it in the original game, so here comes his second attempt! His only chance of surviving this zombie invasion is with the help of his thick-and-thin shurikens. 
 
The player’s main goal is to kill off as many zombies as possible by tapping on both sides of the screen.
